\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 63279}

\subsection*{Illuminous Virtual Fireplace}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{@@}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 10 mg & insufflated & 5-MeO-DiPT & powder / crystals\\
\hline
 T+ 0:30 & 10 mg & insufflated & 5-MeO-DiPT & powder / crystals\\
\hline
 T+ 1:00 & 10 mg & insufflated & 5-MeO-DiPT & powder / crystals\\
\hline
 T+ 1:30 & 15 mg & insufflated & 5-MeO-DALT & powder / crystals\\
\hline
 T+ 1:30 & 375 ml & oral & Alcohol & liquid\\
\hline
 T+ 1:30 & 4.0 g & smoked & Cannabis & plant material\\
\hline
 T+ 2:30 & 24 oz & oral & Kratom & tea\\
\hline
 T+ 2:30 & 25 mg & oral & Pharms - Meclizine & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 2:30 & 12 mg & oral & Melatonin & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 250.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
One night, 3 hour span, 30 mg of 5-meo-dipt crystals insulfated in 10mg lines over an hour and a half, then 15mg 5-meo-dalt insulfated, followed by 375ml of 40\%XO e \& j brandy, 4 grams of cannabis, .25 gram of full melt bubble hashish\ldots , Very warm tactile feelings, overall mood lift + euphoria, if I focus my eyes I get honeycomb red and green visuals in a otherwise single candle lit room\ldots .an hour in 24 oz. of strong kratom tea washes down 25mg of meclizine hcl,  12mg of melatonin , 100mg 5-htp, + velvet bean extract 250mg



feeling the pleasure of the flames for remainder of night, lucid wake erotic sensations masturbation hallucinations\ldots .then I was visited by a grey owl, right in front of my eyes who kept the fire kindled\ldots and although I couldn't sleep, I was satisfied.



Amazing experience which I shall surely repeat with slight variations\ldots .



This is only the beginning @@
